title: Suricata - Flow
description: - This dashboard provides the insights into network flow data processed by Suricata.

definition.content:
The Suricata Flow dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of network flow activities. 

This detailed view helps users analyze network behavior, troubleshoot connectivity issues, and detect anomalies or inefficiencies in network traffic.

For more information, see the [Suricata Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/suricata).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Distribution of Flow by Application Protocol
